description:
This plugin adds a sleek, customizable glass effect to your Bubble.io app with the Glass Effect plugin. This powerful tool allows you to apply a semi-transparent background with adjustable opacity and blur to targeted elements, creating a modern, frosted glass appearance.

[b]Features[/b]
üî• Apply glass effect to specified elements by ID
üî• Customize background opacity from transparent to opaque
üî• Adjust blur intensity for desired visual impact
üî• Easy integration with Bubble.io workflows
